definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: She all but resided in the field house.
sentences.chinese: 她住在运动场附近的房子里。

sentences.english: The stands at the sports ground rake steeply.
sentences.chinese: 运动场的看台坡度很大。

sentences.english: To provide ruminant animal an excellent herding ground with hay or sports field.
sentences.chinese: 提供反刍动物良好之牧草地或运动场。

sentences.english: The following Sunday Andy walked over to me in the exercise yard again.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的星期六，在运动场上，安迪又朝我走来。

sentences.english: There is a beautiful garden in front of the building and a playground behind it.
sentences.chinese: 楼前有一个漂亮的花园，楼后是运动场。

sentences.english: I would rather hoe in the garden than run on the playground.
sentences.chinese: 我宁愿在花园里锄草，不愿在运动场上跑来跑去。

sentences.english: It does not feel good, and it is like running around the playground, circularly, constantly.
sentences.chinese: 这感觉糟糕极了，就像是绕着运动场循环往复地奔跑。

sentences.english: The noise suddenly stopped and the sportsground became very quiet.
sentences.chinese: 突然，打球声停了，运动场上变得静悄悄的。

sentences.english: Lewes is the most experienced athlete in the field.
sentences.chinese: 刘易斯是运动场上最有经验的运动员。

sentences.english: The playground has been blocked out.
The crowds surge out of the sports stadium.
I would rather hoe in the garden than run about on the playground.
sentences.chinese: 我宁愿在花园里锄草，不愿在运动场上跑来跑去。

sentences.english: They crowded through the gate into the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 他们挤过大门，进入运动场。

sentences.english: A concussion of the spinal cord as a result of an on-field collision.
sentences.chinese: 运动场上的冲撞导致的脊髓震荡。

sentences.english: There are six straight tracks on the sports ground.
sentences.chinese: 运动场上有六条修直的跑道。

sentences.english: The arena has influenced the design of modern stadiums.
sentences.chinese: 该竞技场对现代运动场的设计产生了影响。
